title: Particles And Random Physics
description: Made as an education tool, this is a 3D environment, where you can interact with a particle system behaving in accord to some random physics that comes with a short description.

title: GeoSimples
description: Tool designed for creation of simple and standardized images of geometric figures, mainly aimed at educative content creation.

title: Snake Game 3D
description: This is a retro Snake Game actually in 3D, meaning you can move in the three directions of space. Is harder than you think. And there's a lot of customizations.

title: Rick and Morty Character Search
description: A Rick'n'Morty characters mural with custom search and filter parameters.
